Work.name: Shoe Store
Work.description: This project is a simple Nike clone.The website is powered by Next.js for frontend rendering, Tailwind CSS for styling, Strapi for the backend, PostgreSQL for the database, and Stripe as the payment gateway.

Work.name: Weather App
Work.description: It is build using the React JS, with Weather Api for fetching weather data, Presented using backgroud images and icons in both °C and °F.

Work.name: Superchat
Work.description: A real time chat room created using ReactJS and Firebase.

Work.name: Rock Paper Scisssors
Work.description: A multiplayer rock-paper-scissors game created using Socket.io, NodeJS, ExpressJS & ReactJS.

Work.name: Blog Page
Work.description: A markdown blog page application created using NextJS 13, Typescript and Tailwind CSS.

Work.name: Todo App
Work.description: A simple todo app created using ReactJS, store data and todo's state in Localstorage.

Work.name: Realtime Todo
Work.description: A simple todo app created using NextJS and Firebase.

Work.name: NextFlix
Work.description: A movie and web series recommendation tool created using NextJS 13.

Work.name: Mern Developers
Work.description: A simple application created using complete MERN Stack, having features like login, registration, JWT authentication and realtime data retrieval from MongoDB Atlas database.

Work.name: Amazon Product Page
Work.description: A simple replica of Amazon  Product Page having functionalities like Sorting and Filtering elements on basis of different properties.

Work.name: Amazon Product Search
Work.description: A simple replica of Amazon Product created using ReactJs and React Router for routing components and functions , having functionalities like live search and product detailed view.
